long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dollar cost average calculator helps you to find the average cost.
Simply add the Quantity and the Unit Price. 
Add a minimum of two transactions or more.

To add a new input then click button “Add New Transaction”.
To reset all input then click button “Reset All”. 

Formula: Total Cost / Number of Units = Average Cost
